DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Novosis in posterolateral fusion
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Study of Novosis in Posterolateral Fusion
DOC.criteria: 18~80 aged patients needed singlelevel posterolateral fusion at L1~S1 A subject who provided written informed consent to participate in this study Patients with BMD Tscore < 3.0 Women who are pregnant or plan to be pregnant within study period
